settings.sensitive_content_description: This will allow you to upload, search, and view content that is flagged as sensitive content.

close_account.close_my_account_description:
We're sorry to hear that you're considering closing your account.

Please note that once your account is closed, you will loose access to the service.

This action is irreversible, and we cannot return your account!
close_account.close_my_account_step_1_description: Are you sure you want to close your account?
close_account.close_my_account_step_2_description: To continue with the closure process, please confirm by entering the phrase 'CLOSE MY ACCOUNT' below:

login.title: Get started with Gelesen
login.agreement_description: By continuing, you confirm that you have read and agree to the End User License Agreement (EULA), Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Community Guidelines.
login.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
login.unsupported_email_provider: This email provider is not supported.
login.email_code: Please enter the code sent to your email address: {email}
login.account_not_found: Account was either not found or has been closed.

craft.title: Title
craft.scrap_story_description: Are you sure you want to scrap this story?
